channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia welcomes Trump’s proposal to rescind global chip restrictions

item.title: All about the Connecticut home where singer Michael Bolton has been recovering from brain cancer
item.description: Michael Bolton has opened up about the ways he relied on his family at his Connecticut residence during his aggressive brain cancer treatment.

item.title: My second wife says her 2 kids should inherit our estate, but I also have 2 kids. Is that fair?
item.description: “I will leave the $1 million inheritance I received from my parents to my biological daughters.”

item.title: Suze Orman says retirees should have a 5-year ‘just-in-case’ fund. Is this true?
item.description: “I had people coming unglued on me when I suggested retirees should have three to five years of savings.”

item.title: ‘We live modestly’: My wife and I have $900K in stocks and $380K in savings and CDs. Are we holding too much cash?
item.description: “My investment adviser says we have too much invested in cash instruments.”

item.title: Imagination unveils E-Series GPUs for graphics and AI at the edge
item.description: Imagination Technologies is unveiling its E-Series graphics processing units (GPUs) for graphics and AI processing at the edge.
